column3:
Rammsy fa la música mentre la Marina i la Margherita ballen. Observem i detectem. No hi ha lloc correcte i tot està fixat. Intuïtivament, reaccionem. Les coses es ballugues. Els contorns de les muntanyes. Les formes dels arbres. La manera en què el vent raspalla l'herba. Els núvols. I per alguna raó o una altra, trobem les coses que es balluguen difícils de seguir la pista. I li diem a la gent, estiguis quieta així que puc veure't. Mantingue’t quiet per a la càmera. I diem, arreglem les coses, anem a fer-ho quadrar tot. Organitza Upstairsbcn i patrocina Cervesa Montseny.

Exactitudes exhibition opening at Wer-Haus: • Thursday 7th July • 19:00h Photographer Ari Versluis and profiler Ellie Uyttenbroek have worked together since October 1994. Inspired by a shared interest in the striking dress codes of various social groups, they have systematically documented numerous identities over the last 21 years. Rotterdam’s heterogeneous, multicultural street scene remains a major source of inspiration for Ari Versluis and Ellie Uyttenbroek, although since 1998 they have also worked in many cities abroad. They call their series Exactitudes: a contraction of exact and attitude. By registering their subjects in an identical framework, with similar poses and a strictly observed dress code, Versluis and Uyttenbroek provide an almost scientific, anthropological record of people’s attempts to distinguish themselves from others by assuming a group identity. The apparent contradiction between individuality and uniformity is, however, taken to such extremes in their arresting objective-looking photographic viewpoint and stylistic analysis that the artistic aspect clearly dominates the purely documentary element. _________________________________________________________ Wer-Haus Aragó, 287, 08009 Barcelona www.wer-haus.com

El próximo Jueves 7 a partir de las 19h en @ColibriRojobcn #inauguramos la #expobcn de Juan Carlos Valdiviezo "Vida" Una obra inspirada el la vida,en el sentir de las emociones,en la sensualidad de la vida y su decadencia misma como parte del proceso de vida humana.

Dear Friend, I am glad to invite you to the opening of the Barcelona International Photography Awards BIPA 2016. I am presenting the project Night Falls, made in Havana, Cuba. The exhibition will show the works of the eight winners. I hope to see you there! Benvolgut/da amic/amiga, em plau convidar-te a la inauguració dels Barcelona International Photography Awards BIPA 2016. Presento el projecte Night Falls, fet a l'Havana, Cuba. L'exposició presenta els treballs dels vuit guanyadors del premi BIPA. Espero comptar amb la teva presència!
